references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This is the foundational paper introducing Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), the core technology upon which this paper builds.

references.paper_title: Mip-nerf: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper addresses the aliasing problem in NeRFs, a crucial issue that impacts image quality and is relevant to the efficiency improvements of this work.

references.paper_title: Plenoxels: Radiance fields without neural networks
references.reason: This paper presents Plenoxels, an alternative approach to NeRFs that improves efficiency, making it relevant to the training-free acceleration goal of this paper.
This paper introduces TensoRF, a more efficient NeRF model that is used as a benchmark in this paper, highlighting the importance of this reference.

references.paper_title: Mcnerf: Monte carlo rendering and denoising for real-time nerfs
references.reason: This paper tackles the real-time rendering challenge in NeRFs, a key objective addressed through efficiency improvements in this paper.
